error.landmarkNotEnoughPlayers: Not enough players to play with this landmark
error.lockedFaction: Cannot select last faction until a Militant faction has been selected.
error.mapLandmarkUsed: Landmark already included in map setup
error.noDeck: No Decks selected! Please select at least one Deck.
error.noFaction: No Faction selected! Please select a faction to play.
error.noLandmark: No Landmarks selected! Please select at least one Landmark, or set the Landmark count to zero.
error.noMap: No Maps selected! Please select at least one Map.
error.noMilitantFaction: No Militant Factions selected! Please select at least one Militant Faction.
error.tooFewFaction: Not enough Factions selected! Please select more Factions, or lower the player count.
error.tooFewHireling: Not enough Hirelings selected! Please select at least three Hirelings, or skip the Hireling setup.
error.tooFewLandmark: Not enough Landmarks selected! Please select more Landmarks, or lower the Landmark count.
error.tooManyPlayer: Too many players selected! Please lower the player count or include more expansions with additional factions.

band.name: Woodland Band
band.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and 5 warriors for the Woodland Band from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Traveling Band
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and 5 warriors for the Woodland Band from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's demoted "Traveling Band" side up).

bandits.name: Highway Bandits
bandits.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and 4 warriors for the Highway Bandits from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Bandit Guilds
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and 4 warriors for the Highway Bandits from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's demoted "Bandit Guilds" side up).

dynasty.name: Last Dynasty
dynasty.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and 5 warriors for the Last Dynasty from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Bluebird Nobles
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the Last Dynasty hireling card from the game box. Place it next to the map with it's demoted "Bluebird Nobles" side up.

expedition.name: Sunward Expedition
expedition.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card, 8 warriors, and 3 foothold tokens for the Sunward Expedition from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Mole Artisans
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the Sunward Expedition hireling card from the game box. Place it next to the map with it's demoted "Mole Artisans" side up.

flamebearers.name: Flame Bearers
flamebearers.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and 6 warriors for the Flame Bearers from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Rat Ravagers
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the Flame Bearers hireling card from the game box. Place it next to the map with it's demoted "Rat Ravagers" side up.

flotilla.name: Riverfolk Flotilla
flotilla.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and pawn for the Riverfolk Flotilla from the game box. Place the Flotilla pawn in an edge clearing along the river. Place the card next to the map (non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Otter Divers
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the Riverfolk Flotilla hireling card from the game box. Place it next to the map with it's demoted "Otter Divers" side up.

outcast.name: The Outcast
outcast.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card, pawn, and 3 club items for the Outcast from the game box. Place the Outcast pawn in any forest. Place the card next to the map (non-demoted side up) and the 3 club items on top of it (non-exhaused side up).

demoted.name: The Brigand
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the Outcast hireling card from the game box. Place it next to the map with it's demoted "The Brigand" side up. Place items marked with an "R" under the map ruins.

patrol.name: Forest Patrol
patrol.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and 12 warriors for the Forest Patrol from the game box. Place a Patrol warrior in each clearing of the map. Place the hireling card next to the map (non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Feline Physicians
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the Forest Patrol hireling card from the game box. Place it next to the map with it's demoted "Feline Physicians" side up.

prophets.name: Warm Sun Prophets
prophets.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and 4 warriors for the Warm Sun Prophets from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Lizard Envoys
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the Warm Sun Prophets hireling card from the game box. Place it next to the map with it's demoted "Lizard Envoys" side up.

protector.name: Furious Protector
protector.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and pawn for the Furious Protector from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Stoic Protector
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and pawn for the Furious Protector from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's demoted "Stoic Protector" side up).

spies.name: Corvid Spies
spies.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and 6 warriors for the Corvid Spies from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Raven Guards
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the Corvid Spies hireling card from the game box. Place it next to the map with it's demoted "Raven Guards" side up.

uprising.name: Spring Uprising
uprising.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card, 4 warriors, and uprising die for the Spring Uprising from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Rabbit Scouts
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the Spring Uprising hireling card from the game box. Place it next to the map with it's demoted "Rabbit Scouts" side up.

vaultkeepers.name: Vault Keepers
vaultkeepers.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the hireling card and 6 warriors for the Vault Keepers from the game box. Place them next to the map (with the card's non-demoted side up).

demoted.name: Badger Bodyguards
demoted.setup: Player {{count}}, grab the Vault Keepers hireling card from the game box. Place it next to the map with it's demoted "Badger Bodyguards" side up.

fixedFirstPlayer.false: Randomise first player (Player 1 is the person operating this app, Player 2 is the person sitting clockwise from them, etc.)
fixedFirstPlayer.true: Fix first player (Player 1 is the first player in turn order, Player 2 is the second, etc.)

label.useMapLandmark: Use the included Landmark for the selected Map (overriding the landmark's default setup with the map-specific version)

city.name: Lost City
city.setup: Player {{count}}, place the Lost City in a random clearing with the river, not with or adjacent to another Landmark. Grab the "Lost City" landmark card from the game box and place it next to the board on it's non-setup side.

ferry.name: The Ferry
ferry.setup: Player {{count}}, place the Ferry in a random clearing with the river or Lake, not with or adjacent to another Landmark. If you have it, grab "The Ferry" landmark card from the game box and place it next to the board on it's non-setup side.

forge.name: Legendary Forge
forge.setup:
Player {{count}}, place the Legendary Forge in a random clearing, not with or adjacent to another Landmark. Grab the "Legendary Forge" landmark card from the game box and place it next to the board on it's non-setup side. Depending on the suit of the clearing the Forge was placed in, collect the following items from the item supply and place them on the landmark card:

Fox: 2 Swords, 1 Crossbow, 1 Hammer.
Mouse: 2 Bags, 2 Tea.
Rabbit: 2 Boots, 2 Coins.

market.name: Black Market
market.setup: Player {{count}}, place the Black Market in a random clearing with only 1 building slot, not with or adjacent to another Landmark. Grab the "Black Market" landmark card from the game box and place it next to the board on it's non-setup side. Draw 3 cards without looking at them and place them face down next to the landmark card.

tower.name: The Tower
tower.setup: Player {{count}}, place the Tower in a random clearing with a ruin, not with or adjacent to another Landmark. If you have it, grab "The Tower" landmark card from the game box and place it next to the board on it's non-setup side.

treetop.name: Elder Treetop
treetop.setup: Player {{count}}, place the Elder Treetop in a random corner clearing, not with or adjacent to another Landmark. Grab the "Elder Treetop" landmark card from the game box and place it next to the board on it's non-setup side.

autumn.name: Autumn
autumn.setup:
1. Grab the Autumn/Winter map board from the game box and place it down with the Autumn side facing up.
2. Collect the 12 suit markers, flip them face down, and shuffle them, then place one on each clearing, covering the printed suit symbols.
3. Place a ruin in each slot on the map marked with an "R" (four in total).
4. Form the Item Supply by placing the matching items on the item supply spaces near the top of the map.
5. Place the two dice near the map.

lake.name: Lake
lake.setup:
1. Grab the Lake/Mountain map board from the game box and place it down with the Lake side facing up.
2. Collect the 12 suit markers, flip them face down, and shuffle them, then place one on each clearing.
3. Place a ruin in each slot on the map marked with an "R" (four in total).
4. Form the Item Supply by placing the matching items on the item supply spaces near the top of the map.
5. Place the two dice near the map.
lake.landmarkSetup: Place the Ferry piece in the corner clearing that is also a coastal clearing. If you have it, grab "The Ferry" landmark card from the game box and place it next to the board on it's non-setup side.

mountain.name: Mountain
mountain.setup:
1. Grab the Lake/Mountain map board from the game box and place it down with the Mountain side facing up.
2. Place the 6 closed path markers to cover the 6 paths of darker color with excavated ground.
3. Collect the 12 suit markers, flip them face down, and shuffle them, then place one on each clearing.
4. Place a ruin in each slot on the map marked with an "R" (four in total).
5. Form the Item Supply by placing the matching items on the item supply spaces near the top of the map.
6. Place the two dice near the map.
mountain.landmarkSetup: Place the Tower piece in the central clearing showing two towers. If you have it, grab "The Tower" landmark card from the game box and place it next to the board on it's non-setup side.

winter.name: Winter
winter.setup:
1. Grab the Autumn/Winter map board from the game box and place it down with the Winter side facing up.
2. Collect the 12 suit markers, flip them face down, and shuffle them, then place one on each clearing.
3. Place a ruin in each slot on the map marked with an "R" (four in total).
4. Form the Item Supply by placing the matching items on the item supply spaces near the top of the map.
5. Place the two dice near the map.

chooseExpansions.body: Welcome to the Root automated setup! To get started, select which Root content you are playing with. When you are ready to move on to the next step, use the buttons at the bottom of the screen to do so.

chooseMap.title: Choose and Set up Map
chooseMap.body: As a group, decide which map you would like to play on. If you select multiple maps, a random map will be chosen from the selected.

chooseDeck.title: Choose and Set up Deck
chooseDeck.body: As a group, decide which deck you would like to use. If you select multiple decks, a random deck will be chosen from the selected.

setUpDeck.title: Set up Deck
setUpDeck.subtitle: Set up the {{deck}} Deck.
setUpDeck.body: Grab the {{deck}} deck from the game box and place it next to the map. If you will be playing with less than three players, remove all four dominance cards from the deck. Shuffle the deck.

setUpBots.title: Set up Bots
setUpBots.body: As a group, decide which bots you would like to play with, following their setup instructions as described in the Law of Rootbotics.

seatPlayers.title: Seat Players
seatPlayers.body: Determine the player seating order, then select how many players you are playing with, and if you wish for the app to choose a random starting player.

chooseLandmarks.title: Set up Landmarks
chooseLandmarks.body: As a group, decide how many landmarks you want to play with (in addition to the map landmark if it was included), and which ones to include in the selection pool.

chooseHirelings.title: Set up Hirelings
chooseHirelings.body: As a group, decide if you want to play with Hirelings, and which ones to include in the selection pool.

postHirelingSetup.subtitle: Place Hireling Markers.
postHirelingSetup.body: Place the three hireling markers - marked "4," "8," and "12" - on the "4," "8," and "12" spaces of the score track on the map.

drawCards.title: Draw Five Cards
drawCards.body: Each player draw five cards from the deck. (You will choose three cards to keep later.)

chooseFactions.title: Set up Factions
chooseFactions.body: As a group, select which factions you would like to include in the selection pool.

selectFaction.subtitle: Choose Faction.
selectFaction.body: Player {{count}}, choose which faction you would like to play from the faction pool below.

placeScoreMarkers.title: Place Score Markers
placeScoreMarkers.body: Each player place their chosen faction's score marker on the "0" space of the score track.

chooseHand.title: Choose Starting Hands
chooseHand.body: Each player chooses three cards in their hand to keep and puts the other two cards face down on the shared deck. When finished, shuffle the shared deck.
